name: Finance Outstanding
query:
select 
    sales.letter_head as `Letter Head:Data:75`,
    sales.name as `Invoice No:Data:150`,
    sales.posting_date as `Date:Date:100`,
    sales.customer as `Customer:Link/Customer:150`,
    sales.customer_name as `Customer Name:Data:200`,
    sales.hypothecation as `Finance Co.:Data:150`,
    sales.reference as `Reference:Data:100`,
    sales.finance_remarks as `Remarks:Data:150`,
    sales.grand_total as `Invoice Amount:Float:100`,    
    (select sum(grd.grand_total) from `tabSales Invoice` grd
      where 
          grd.customer = sales.customer
            and grd.docstatus = 1) as `Total Customer Billing:Float:125`,    
    ((select ifnull(sum(debit),0) 
      from `tabGL Entry` 
        where 
          party=sales.customer 
            and party_type='Customer' and posting_date<=%(to_date)s)-
    (select ifnull(sum(credit),0) 
      from `tabGL Entry` 
        where 
          party=sales.customer 
            and party_type='Customer')) as `Current Customer Balance:Float:125`  
from 
    `tabSales Invoice` as sales 
where 
    sales.docstatus= 1
    and (sales.hypothecation is not null 
      and sales.hypothecation <> '')
    and sales.posting_date >= %(from_date)s
    and sales.posting_date <= %(to_date)s
    and sales.hypothecation like %(finance_co)s
    and sales.letter_head like %(let)s
order by 
    sales.posting_date, 
    sales.customer_name
